info.name: 4chon - DarkNcomfy
info.description:
A dark and comfy userstyle for 4chon.net. Has a fixed postbox and optional mascots!

For the full experience install 4chon X and reply popup script.

4chon X http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/101133

reply popup script http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/110735


Features
- Styled wiki
- Fixed and styled postbox
- Fixed page navigation
- Supports HTTPS
- Support 4chon X and reply popup script

Tested on Firefox 8 and Google Chrome.

Opera not yet supported, working on it.

**Known Bugs**
- Checked checkboxes do not appear to be checked in Google Chrome. (It still works though.)
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.2
- Added support for archives. 

1.1 hotfix
- Fixed the front page

Version 1.1

- Fixed the postbox in Chrome. It now looks great.

- Added option to change width of posts.
- Added option to choose font.
- Added option to put pages on the bottom.
- Added option to choose rounded or sharp edges.
- Added option to show banner.
- Added option to show announcements.
- Added option to choose rounded or square checkboxes.


Version 1.0
